targets.query:
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "WIMWV")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "windAngle" or r["_field"] == "windSpeed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "${device_id}")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "WIMDA")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "windDirectionTrue" or r["_field"] == "windSpeedMetersPerSecond")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "${device_id}")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "WIMDA")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "airTemperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "${device_id}")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "WIMDA")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dewPoint")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "${device_id}")

import "math"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BME280")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pressure")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "${device_id}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 100.0}))

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "WIMDA")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "relativeHumidity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "${device_id}")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "VEML6075")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rawUVA")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "${device_id}")
